this_title: Wondrous Obsessions: The Cabinet of Curiosities
introduction: As the popularity of collecting fairs and Pinterest would attest, we are a nation of magpie obsessions. Renaissance expert Professor Nandini Das reveals the story behind the Cabinet of Curiosities - the original collecting craze that began in Renaissance Europe in the 16th and 17th centuries, and which is experiencing a surprising revival in the work of contemporary artists today.
chinese_title: Wondrous Obsessions: The Cabinet of Curiosities
